author: dkulp
msg: Change spec deps in poms, cleanup systests
* Change to using the org.apache.geronimo.specs spec jars when possible
* Remove the saaj-impl dependency on the tools (only needs the api jar)
* Remove a printStackTrace from the code to fix a stack trace printout in the system tests
* Remove a println in the system tests

author: andreasmyth
msg: Support for standalone LastMessage and SequenceAcknowledgment messages.
Termination of an offered sequence when the offering sequence is terminated.
Soap binding to tolerate empty body during unmarshal.
